text: @realDonaldTrump #Respect from India. For standing up and demanding an enquiry for the CoVid19 fiasco and WHO role. Most of the free world leaders today are taking (unfair) criticism and taking a hit on their public image BUT standing UP to the challenge. When will journos question Xi Jingping?
